summary.span: 해당 또는 접근자를 사용하여 개체의 속성 값에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소의 값이 읽기 전용인지 여부를 지정하는 값을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: 값이 읽기 전용이면 이고, 값을 수정할 수 있으면 입니다.

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 컨트롤 있어야 해당 로 설정 `true` 및 해당 로 설정 `false` 만들어지기를 개체입니다.A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 지는 컨트롤별 따라 해당 값을 증가 또는 감소를 포함 하는 컨트롤 패턴 값입니다.In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: 속성에 추가되거나 이 속성에서 뺀 컨트롤별 큰 변경 값을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: 큰 변경 값 또는 요소가 를 지원하지 않는 경우 입니다.

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

summary.span: 요소 속성에 더하거나 이 속성에서 뺀 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소 고유의 작은 변경 값을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.

value.span: 에 고유한 작은 변경 값을 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 요소 또는 요소를 지원 하지 않는 경우 합니다.

span.span: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.
